name: damselfly
description: Damselfly is a self-hosted photo and video management app with AI-powered tagging and search features. It includes facial recognition, bulk processing, and a responsive UI for browsing media collections efficiently.
features: AI-Powered Tagging: Automatic image recognition and labeling. Organize photos effortlessly.
Facial Recognition: Identify and group people automatically. Find photos by person.
Smart Search: Find photos using AI-powered queries. Locate images instantly.
Bulk Processing: Handle large photo collections efficiently. Process thousands of images.
Responsive UI: Beautiful interface that works on all devices. Browse anywhere, anytime.
Self-Hosted: Keep your photos private on your server. Complete control over memories.
